chapter.title: DITA For Publishers Vocabulary Reference
chapter.shortdesc: This section provides reference entries for each of the DITA for Publishers element types and attributes.

body.p: This section is an alphabetical reference by element type and attribute name for all the DITA for Publishers vocabulary modules.
body.note: The vocabulary reference is under development. For now you'll have to look at the module declaration files or at the various sample documents.
